title: "Wrong" Icon showing next to my account.
content:
If I go to the setting and click on "Password Manager Google play services" I get a pop-up asking me which account to use (I have 2 on my phone) and everything looks ok with a "J" in a circle for the first letter of my name, just like every other time this appears on my phone or in chrome or Google site on my laptop.

But if I select the option to change my password "Password, Google Account > Security" The is a "m" in the circle for the first letter of my email address"

Not exactly a big issue but just a little annoying but it could mean there is something on my phone where I have not entered my name.

I did set up my new phone manually and not with the usb cable transfer.
